## autoNormalMatrix2 variable

Computes the inverse transpose of the matrix product of given 4x4 matrix uniforms, i.e. `transpose(invert(view * model))`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
autoNormalMatrix2: (model?: string, view?: string) => (shaderU: ShaderUniforms, specU: IObjectOf<number | import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>>) => GLMat4
```
